meanings.sent1: The immotile rock stood still in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The immotile caterpillar remained on the leaf for hours.
meanings.sent3: The immotile toy car refused to budge from its spot on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The immotile clouds hung motionless in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The immotile statue in the park seemed frozen in time.

meanings.sent1: The immotile patient had to be carried to the wheelchair.
meanings.sent2: The immotile robot was unable to follow the moving target.
meanings.sent3: The immotile clock hands refused to tick, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The immotile traffic jam stretched for miles on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The immotile tree roots prevented the plant from growing freely.
